work.summary: As a DevOps engineer, worked on various automation stack technologies like Chef, Salt, Rundeck, Hasicorp Vault and Jenkins on Microsoft Azure
highlights: Built the NCR automation stack from the ground up
Helped onboard multple products onto NCR SaaS pubic cloud platform
Brought down Sevice Delivery timeline from several days to few hours

work.summary: Analyzed large data sets using Google technologies like Mapreduce, BigTable, Dremel and others to scope new filter ideas to handle invalid ad-clicks by deriving user intent from logs
highlights: Reviewed over 3000 AdSense publisher accounts and appeals resulting in $2bn credits to advertisers
Worked with SafeBrowsing Ops team to detect a malware affecting 250+ AdSense accounts & $600k cost in invalid traffic
Proposed a proactive workflow for malware reviews in the AdSpam Ops team

work.summary: Designed technology roadmap for the e-learning start-up, built the platform from scratch
highlights: Operationalized one of the largest academic portals in India
Started the first live Internet TV for the students of Andhra Pradesh, India
Distibuted no cost academic material to rural students

volunteer.summary: A community Internet Exchange in Inda focused on dense interconnection between ISPs, telcos, content providers and academic institutions in the region
highlights: Established the IX from the ground up
Liason with global Internet organizations like APNIC, PCH etc.
Motivate and train local ISPs and prospective IX members on interconnection and associated benefits

volunteer.summary: Worked as an English teaching volunteer, helping the poor and deprived kids learn Cambridge curriculum English
